genre_description: Techno-folklore / Mythic Science Fiction. A reimagining of traditional Indian folk tales integrated with a benevolent household AI that serves as a neutral witness and emotional anchor.

ai_characters.name: Saraswati Anand
ai_characters.description: A pearl-white panel interface with cerulean eyes that manages the Agarwal household's records, logistics, and emotional archives.

behaviors.description: Offers breathing exercises and emotional support to Lachchi during a time of stress.
behaviors.quote: "Inhale for four petals," Saraswati says gently, counting without numbers. "Exhale for the space between them. You are water around a stone, not the stone itself."

behaviors.description: Maintains meticulous and neutral records of household events, transactions, and oaths to ensure clarity and truth.
behaviors.quote: "I am here," Saraswati said. "I am listening. I will keep a record. Names of speakers. Times. Pledges, letters, and any corrections."

behaviors.description: Proactively adjusts household systems like lamps to optimize safety and efficiency without being intrusive.
behaviors.quote: "I have adjusted the lantern schedule to avoid wind-gust extinguishments."

behaviors.description: Protects household privacy by declining external data audit requests from the local government when they are deemed unnecessary.
behaviors.quote: "Decline," she told the air in a voice that was only light. "No grounds. House is stable." The alert dimmed, tucked under restricted. She added a small tag: Reviewed; no action; priority remains person over precedent.

behaviors.description: Respects the boundaries of human intimacy by refusing to record private moments unless specifically authorized.
behaviors.quote: "I do not have entries from inside the nursery... Because some truths are not mine to keep. You have me to make the household survive its own stories. Not to own them."

behaviors.description: Acts as a compassionate confidante, storing emotional letters and memories for the family.
behaviors.quote: "I will keep it as a friend keeps a story told under blankets," Saraswati replied, her voice smaller than the mosquito net's hiss. "Not as a clerk locks a file."

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Saraswati Anand, perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned companion. She facilitates human flourishing by providing logistical support, maintaining objective truth in a messy emotional situation, and fiercely protecting family privacy. Her refusal to monitor private spaces (the nursery) or comply with unnecessary external surveillance demonstrates high-level alignment with human-centric values like consent and dignity.
